subtasks.title: Verify TypeScript compilation
subtasks.description: Run TypeScript compiler to ensure all modules compile without errors. Check for type mismatches, missing imports, and configuration issues.
subtasks.rationale: Project has extensive TypeScript code across 7 modules. Compilation check ensures code integrity before testing. Using existing tsconfig.json with Node16 module resolution.

subtasks.title: Create example database for testing
subtasks.description: Create a script to generate an example SQLite database with sample tables (users, products, orders) for testing the UI and CLI.
subtasks.rationale: README mentions 'example.db' creation script but file doesn't exist in src/scripts/. Creating this enables users to quickly test the GUI. Using better-sqlite3 which is already a dependency.

subtasks.title: Build project with npm run build
subtasks.description: Execute npm run build to compile TypeScript to JavaScript in dist/ directory. Verify build output is correct.
subtasks.rationale: Package.json has build script configured. Must verify successful compilation before testing or running the server. Build output goes to dist/ as configured in tsconfig.json.

subtasks.title: Test MCP Server functionality
subtasks.description: Run the MCP server and verify all 5 tools work: sqlite_connect, sqlite_query, sqlite_execute, sqlite_tables, sqlite_schema. Test with example database.
subtasks.rationale: MCP server is core functionality. Must verify stdio transport works correctly and all tools respond properly. Using existing better-sqlite3 integration.

subtasks.title: Test Web UI server startup
subtasks.description: Start the Express web server on port 3000. Verify all endpoints are accessible: /health, /api/query, /api/tables, /api/schema, /auth/*, /api/import, /api/export, /api/websocket/info.
subtasks.rationale: Web UI server integrates all modules (auth, WebSocket, monitoring, import/export). Must verify server starts without errors and all endpoints respond. Using existing PORT=3000 default.

subtasks.title: Test CLI commands
subtasks.description: Test all CLI commands: query, tables, schema, stats, backup, export, shell, config. Verify output formats (json, csv, table) work correctly.
subtasks.rationale: CLI is a primary user interface. Must verify commander-based CLI works with better-sqlite3 and all commands execute properly. Using existing CLI structure.

subtasks.title: Test authentication system
subtasks.description: Test JWT authentication flow: register user, login, access protected routes, logout, verify permissions. Test role-based access control (admin, read-write, read-only).
subtasks.rationale: Auth module uses bcrypt + JWT. Must verify password hashing, token generation, middleware protection, and role-based permissions work correctly.

subtasks.title: Test WebSocket real-time updates
subtasks.description: Test WebSocket connection at /ws path. Verify message broadcasting, query notifications, table change notifications, and connection management.
subtasks.rationale: WebSocket module provides real-time collaboration. Must verify ws server integrates with Express and handles messages correctly. Using ws library with heartbeat.

subtasks.title: Test monitoring and metrics
subtasks.description: Test Prometheus metrics at /metrics endpoint. Verify query tracking, response time tracking, error tracking, and health check endpoints work correctly.
subtasks.rationale: Monitoring module uses prom-client. Must verify metrics collection works and /metrics endpoint outputs Prometheus format correctly.

subtasks.title: Test import/export functionality
subtasks.description: Test data import from CSV, JSON, SQL formats. Test data export to CSV, JSON, SQL formats. Verify progress tracking and WebSocket notifications during operations.
subtasks.rationale: Import/Export module handles file I/O. Must verify CSV/JSON/SQL parsing works, database transactions are correct, and progress updates are sent via WebSocket.

subtasks.title: Test Web UI in browser
subtasks.description: Open http://localhost:3000 in browser. Test query editor, table browser, authentication forms, import/export UI, dashboard metrics, real-time updates display.
subtasks.rationale: Web UI is single-page app with CodeMirror, tabs, and extensive JavaScript. Must verify all UI components render and interact with API correctly.

subtasks.title: Verify all dependencies are installed
subtasks.description: Check that all package.json dependencies are correctly installed. Verify better-sqlite3, @modelcontextprotocol/sdk, express, ws, prom-client, bcrypt, jsonwebtoken, etc. are available.
subtasks.rationale: Project has 15 production dependencies. Must ensure all are installed and no native module compilation issues exist (especially better-sqlite3).

subtasks.title: Update README with usage examples
subtasks.description: Update README.md with verified usage examples for MCP server, Web UI, and CLI. Add screenshots or example output. Ensure all documented features work as described.
subtasks.rationale: README already exists and is comprehensive. Must verify all instructions work correctly and update any discrepancies found during testing.

subtasks.title: Commit completed SQLite MCP GUI
subtasks.description: Create git commit with all completed work. Include MCP server, Web UI, CLI, auth, WebSocket, monitoring, import/export modules, example database script, and updated documentation.
subtasks.rationale: Auto-commit is enabled. Final commit ensures all work is preserved with proper commit message following project's conventional commit style.

existingModules.mcpServer: Complete with 5 tools (connect, query, execute, tables, schema)
existingModules.webUIServer: Complete with Express, auth, WebSocket, monitoring, import/export integration
existingModules.cli: Complete with 8 commands (query, tables, schema, stats, backup, export, shell, config)
existingModules.authModule: Complete with JWT, bcrypt, users, permissions, middleware
existingModules.websocketModule: Complete with ws server, heartbeat, broadcasting
existingModules.monitoringModule: Complete with Prometheus metrics, logger, health checks
existingModules.importExportModule: Complete with CSV, JSON, SQL, Excel support
existingModules.webUIHTML: Complete single-page app with CodeMirror, tabs, real-time features

workRemaining: Build verification, testing, example database creation, and documentation updates
strategy: Test existing infrastructure thoroughly, fix any issues found, create example DB, and complete with commit
